body.p: It's been a few years since you walked across the Drillfield, jumped to Enter Sandman in Lane Stadium, or spotted the Hokie Bird. Despite all this time, one thing is true: Blacksburg, Virginia, remains a place like no other. Its deep-rooted traditions and small-town vibes make this place feel like no other.

This guide is designed for alumni returning to rediscover Blacksburg's best fries. From familiar downtown restaurants to new gems that have sprung up since your last visit, you'll find plenty to reignite your love for this small town. Whether you're here for a football game, a reunion, or simply a stroll down memory lane, this guide will help you navigate the old and the new so you can savor some good food that makes Blacksburg home.
